resources.string: Introduce tu correo para recuperar contraseña

1. Acceptance of the Terms\n\nBy using our exercise tracking application, you agree to comply with and be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with these terms, do not use our application.

2. Registration and Accounts\n\nBy creating an account, you warrant that the information provided is true, accurate, and complete. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password.
3. Privacy\n\nWe value your privacy. See our Privacy Policy for details on how we handle your information.
4. Acceptable Use\n\nYou must use our app in a way that does not cause harm, is illegal, or fraudulently. You must not attempt to access our app unauthorized.
5. Intellectual Property\n\nThe content of this application is owned by DevRiders and is protected by copyright laws. You may not copy, redistribute, or resell our content without our permission.

6. Limitation of Liability\n\nOur application is provided "as is". We do not guarantee it will be perfectly suitable for your specific needs. DevRiders shall not be liable for any injury, loss, or damage related to the use of this application.
7. Advertising and Promotions\n\nWe may display advertisements and promotions. We are not responsible for the content of the ads or any transaction you may conduct with an advertiser.
8. Termination\n\nWe reserve the right to close or suspend your account if you violate these terms.
9. Changes to the Terms\n\nWe may update these terms at any time. It is your responsibility to review these terms regularly.
10. Applicable Law and Jurisdiction\n\nThese terms are governed by the laws of Chile. Any dispute will be resolved in the courts of Santiago, Chile.
11. Contact\n\nFor any inquiries about these terms, contact us at devriderssolutions@gmail.com.

1. Information We Collect\n\nWe collect information directly provided by the user when registering and using our application, which may include name, email address, date of birth, gender, and data related to your physical activity and exercise goals.

2. How We Use Your Information

We use the collected information to:

Provide and enhance our service.
Answer your queries or requests.
Send communications, including promotional ones.
Monitor and analyze trends and usages.

3. Sharing Your Information

We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties for commercial purposes. We might share your information only under the following circumstances:

With service providers working on our behalf.
If required by law.
In relation to any merger, sale of company assets, financing or acquisition.
4. Advertising and Cookies\n\nWe use cookies and other technologies to collect information about our applications usage and to deliver interest-based advertising.
5. Security\n\nWe take measures to protect your information against loss, theft, misuse, and unauthorized access.
6. Access and Modification\n\nUsers can access, correct or delete their personal information by contacting our team.
7. Links to Other Sites\n\nOur application may contain links to other sites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of such sites.
8. Changes to this Policy\n\nWe may occasionally update this policy. If we make significant changes, we will notify you.
9. Contact\n\nIf you have questions about this privacy policy, contact us at devriderssolutions@gmail.com.
